resources.string: For the bonus game\nYou have earned:
Balance - Your current balance is displayed here.
Rate - Your rate is displayed here.
Spin - the button to start the slot, before pressing it, you need to make a bet.
Autospin - the button to automatically start the slot, before pressing it, you need to adjust the bet, the cancellation occurs by pressing it next.
Menu - button to go to the Menu screen.
Slot - this is where the game takes place.
Scatter - if 3 scatters appear on the slot, the super game starts.
Wild - a universal element, combine in combination with any element.
Win - possible winning combinations: 1-3, 1-4, 1-5. The same symbol must be contained from reels 1 to 5, no matter which row is the main one in sequence.
Glow - if a winning combination has fallen out, the background of the winning element is highlighted in yellow.
